    • Method Detail

      • discretize

        public static MeshPoint[] discretize(MeshPoint[] pt,
                     double disqrtr,
                     int maxnpt)
        divided into segments with equal integral of the square root of the radius, given by disqrtr. This balances the charging rate of points in the final discretization and its definition is independent of the electrical properties of the membrane. It provides a more consistent discretization than the electrotonic length, and is valid in the absence of persistent currents. Tapering segments are treated as such and not approximated by a series of cylinders. The discretization does, however, respect the actual points of the structure to which clamps or recorders may be attached.
